sub_title: Senior Manager Corporate Communications at ING
summary: I have about ten years of experience in marketing, communications, corporate social responsibility (CSR) and business development in the public, private and entrepreneurial sectors across Asia-Pacific. I am extremely passionate about branding , marketing and CSR which I believe are key to an organization's success in today's competitive market.

profile_positions.description:
o Manages the marketing, branding and CSR portfolios for 13 markets in Asia.                                  
o Events management – ensures strong, prominent and positive branding for ING at client and industry events.
o Advertising – concept and copy co-creation with creative agencies and the application of the advertisements in print and online media. 
o CSR – spearheads ING Asia’s regional CSR initiatives and is the secretariat for the bank’s regional CSR committee (members: all country and business heads in Asia). Manages the ING Orange Bike project and its implementation in Indonesia, the Philippines and Thailand, overseeing program development, implementation, funding and monitoring.  (http://ing.worldbicyclerelief.org/) 
o Internal communications – oversees HR communications and internal CSR activation.
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager, Corporate Communications, ING Commercial Banking Asia

profile_positions.description:
o	Developed the Rollies shoe concept and brand (www.rollies.sg).
o	Produced two Rollies shoe collections annually (http://www.rollies.sg/colours.html).
o	Built new online and in-store distribution channels in Singapore and France.
o	Launched the Rollies Safari collection at the 2011 Cannes Film Festival. 
        (http://www.facebook.com/Rollies.France).
o	Identified strategic marketing channels and developed content for media pitches, traditional  
        marketing and online/digital campaigns. 
o	Ranked the top ‘10 interesting start-ups to watch’ by SME Magazine, by The Business Times 
        Singapore in 2011.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder & Director, Marketing & Business Development

profile_positions.description:
o	Worked in the team overseeing Brand, Corporate Social Responsibility & Sponsorships for six 
        markets (Singapore, Hong Kong, Indonesia, India, China and Taiwan).
o	Identified and developed a new Regional CSR programme supporting social entrepreneurship in     
        DBS’ six markets.
o	Produced a strategic CSR Concept Toolkit and conducted workshops to seek consensus for the 
        new programme from the Board, the Management Committee and staff in all markets (15,000 
        people in all).
o	Developed and implemented regular brand, recruitment and product campaigns in DBS’ six    
        markets, incorporating television, radio, print and outdoor advertisements. 
o	Managed corporate sponsorships, evaluated over 300 sponsorship requests annually and 
        organised the Singapore Formula One Grand Prix and the DBS Marina Regatta sponsorships 
        worth over USD $4 million (http://www.dbsmarinaregatta.com).
o	Revamped DBS’ recruitment advertising model, introduced a new employer branding concept 
        that featured Singapore’s first ‘behind the scenes’ recruitment tour for banks 
        (http://sbr.com.sg/financial-services/news/dbs-bank-unveils-innovative-recruitment-strategy-woo-
        talent).
profile_positions.title: Assistant Vice-President, Group Strategic Marketing & Communications

profile_positions.description:
o	Worked on Group-level internal and external communications covering six markets (Singapore, 
        Hong Kong, Indonesia, India, China and Taiwan).
o	Monitored and managed media relations, crafted over three media releases a month and 
        responded to over 30 media queries a week, for a range of issues from new product launches to 
        crisis management. 
o	Developed a Regional Internal Communication Toolkit and Campaign to create awareness and 
        engage over 15,000 staff in six countries when new organization-wide decisions and 
        programmes were announced, including the Bank’s new strategic direction, service standards  
        and change management approaches.
profile_positions.title: Associate, Group Strategic Marketing & Communications

profile_positions.description:
o	Headed a 12-member Budget Publicity Team, developed and implemented pre- and post-Budget 
        communications, including web content, four print advertisements, over 20 media interviews, 10 
        forums with business leaders and four Ministerial dialogues annually. 
o	Assumed the role of Press Secretary for the Second Minister for Finance & Transport, 
        coordinated over 50 official events, wrote over 30 speeches and crafted over 100 media replies 
        annually. 
o	Conceptualized the ‘If I Were The Finance Minister’ flash animated online game (to promote 
        awareness on the annual Budget), which was commended and recognized by the US 
        Government.
o	Selected as the only Senior Associate in Singapore to visit the Centre of Information, London for 
        an intensive leadership workshop on publicity and information management meant for Directors 
        in the Public Service.
profile_positions.title: Senior Associate, Marketing & Communications

profile_positions.description:
o	Managed the evaluated the annual National Development Budget worth USD $2 billion.
o	Identified the optimal cost and funding for key national projects including the Gardens by The  
        Bay, Boat-Lock at Marina Bay and Parks Connector Network, worked closely with the CEOs of 
        Statutory Boards and Permanent Secretaries of Ministries to finalise optional project funding. 
o	Worked on the concept and implementation of the GST Offset Package and Growth Dividends 
        schemes, which disbursed over USD $5 billion in monetary payouts to over four million  
        Singaporeans over five years.
o	Conducted a study on the impact of Government policy on the quality of life and talent 
        attraction, which resulted in a set of key policy strategies implemented to attract high-net 
        individuals.
profile_positions.title: Analyst, Social Policies & Programmes
